verses.name: 1 Chronicles 16:13
verses.text: O ye seed of Israel his servant, ye children of Jacob, his chosen ones.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 16:14
verses.text: He is the Lord our God; his judgments are in all the earth.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 16:15
verses.text: Be ye mindful always of his covenant; the word which he commanded to a thousand generations;

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 16:16
verses.text: Even of the covenant which he made with Abraham, and of his oath unto Isaac;

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 16:17
verses.text: And hath confirmed the same to Jacob for a law, and to Israel for an everlasting covenant,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 16:18
verses.text: Saying, Unto thee will I give the land of Canaan, the lot of your inheritance;
